page.title: 02Mr. Palmer's Farm
page.content: {Mr.Palmer}has worked on a farm all his working life. His farm is small compared to other farms, but consists of{50 cows, 35}of which are{milkers, {and 15 calves.}On his farm Mr. Palmer employs{6 people.}The machinery he owns is{a combine harvester, 3 {tractors and attachments.}Mr. Palmer's cows produce an average of{80 to 85 {gallons of milk a day.}Besides milk, Mr. Palmer deals in{sugar beet, corn {and barley.}Modern machinery has meant a loss of jobs on the farm. In December he turns the soil over and sharp frosts do the land good. In the Spring he cultivates the soil and sows his{Spring barley.}He has to have a good start to the year or his land will dry up. After Spring he has to be ready for sugar beet which he sows in March. In Summer he harvests his corn and in Autumn he harvests his beet.
